sense.name: speculate, study, analyze, think over
sense.commentary: Note: Object or topic being contemplated may be omitted
sense.examples: Here are some questions that pop into one's head while contemplating a job change. Contemplating in the shower, I realized there was no coffee here. How can one shower and drink coffee? Woman contemplating in the park: pictures by Inspirestock Some of the clubs had been contemplating reducing the number of players to less than 15.

sense.name: look at carefully, observe
sense.examples: Contemplate your navel. Tourists contemplated their shoelaces and smiled to themselves. It was entitled 'Trekker man using a hat and backpack while contemplating a beautiful sunset'.
